p: The biogeographic, biodiversity, and economic importance of the flora and vegetation in the area has been widely studied (Emberger and Maire 1932; Capot-Rey 1952; Guinet and Sauvage 1954; Boudy 1958; Dubief 1963; Sauvage 1963; Quézel 1965; Chaumat 1977; Donadieu 1977; Barbéro et al. 1981; Barbéro et al. 1982; Peltier 1982, 1986; Coquillard 1983; Michalet 1991; El Aboudi et al. 1992; Msanda 1993; Quézel et al. 1994; Quézel 1995; Peltier and Msanda 1995; Benabid and Cuzin 1997; M’hirit et al. 1998; Médail and Quézel 1999; Benabid 2000; Msanda et al. 2002, 2005; Lybbert 2007; Lybbert et al. 2011).
